00020 #ifndef BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANEFROMLINEANDPOINT_H_
00021 #define BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANEFROMLINEANDPOINT_H_
00022 
00023 #include "brics_3d/algorithm/segmentation/objectModels/ObjectModelPlane.h"
00024 
00025 namespace brics_3d {
00026 
00031 class ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint : public ObjectModelPlane{
00032 protected:
00034         static const double geometryEpsilon=1e-3;
00035 
00036 
00037 public:
00038 
00039         ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint(){};
00040         virtual ~ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint(){};
00041 
00042         struct line{
00043                 Point3D pbase;
00044                 std::vector<double> director;
00045         };
00046 
00049         inline bool contains(const line &line,Point3D &point){
00050                 double dx=point.getX()-line.pbase.getX();
00051                 double dy=point.getY()-line.pbase.getY();
00052                 double dz=point.getZ()-line.pbase.getZ();
00053                 if (abs(dx)<geometryEpsilon&&abs(dy)<geometryEpsilon&&abs(dz)<geometryEpsilon) return true;
00054 
00055                 //       dx          dy          dz
00056                 //if -----------=-----------=-----------, point is inside the line.
00057                 //   director[0] director[1] director[2]
00058 
00059                 return (abs(dx*line.director[1]-dy*line.director[0])<geometryEpsilon)&&
00060                                 (abs(dx*line.director[2]-dz*line.director[0])<geometryEpsilon)&&
00061                                 (abs(dy*line.director[2]-dz*line.director[1])<geometryEpsilon);
00062         }
00063 
00076         inline void crossProduct3D(
00077                         const std::vector<double> &v0,
00078                         const std::vector<double> &v1,
00079                         std::vector<double> &v_out){
00080                                 assert(v0.size()==3);
00081                                 assert(v1.size()==3);
00082                 v_out[0] =  v0[1]*v1[2] - v0[2]*v1[1];
00083                 v_out[1] = -v0[0]*v1[2] + v0[2]*v1[0];
00084                 v_out[2] =  v0[0]*v1[1] - v0[1]*v1[0];
00085         }
00086 
00087         void getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples);
00088         bool computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples, Eigen::VectorXf &model_coefficients);
00089 
00090         void computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXf &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate, bool &modelFound);
00091         inline int getNumberOfSamplesRequired(){return 3;};
00092 
00093 
00094 };
00095 }
00096 #endif /* BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANEFROMLINEANDPOINT_H_ */
